reviewText:
I ordered this DVD expecting to see something like the Passion of the Christ and while that's not what I recieved, what I got was even more interesting.

The movie looks at 20th century racism from tne perspective of the Jesus story. It is a very religious movie, it just decides to take us where it is going from a different point of view.

The acting is good and the film is well shot. As the title woudl suggest its bloody.
